short_summary: Construction of storage garage in Whitehorse, Yukon
description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE: Please ignore the response deadline that appears in the Ariba Discovery posting. You must submit your bid and all required supporting documentation by 17:00 EDT on October 19, 2022 All bids submitted after 17:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive. Work Description: Work of this Contract comprises the construction of a new 239 m2 storage garage at the Environment and Climate Change Canada Compound, located at 91782 Alaska Highway, Whitehorse, Yukon. The Contractor must perform and complete the Work by March 31, 2024.
